underlying_goal: To improve a brainstorming workflow by researching state-of-the-art methods for using LLMs in creative ideation and experiment design, and then designing an implementation plan for the new workflow.
primary_success: Claude conducted a comprehensive literature review on LLM-powered brainstorming, synthesizing findings from multiple research papers into a coherent set of actionable improvements. It then designed a new workflow, subjected its own plan to a multi-agent critique, and produced a final, refined plan that included new user-facing skills.
brief_summary: The user wanted to improve their brainstorming process. Claude researched academic papers and best practices for LLM-based ideation, synthesizing a list of evidence-backed improvements. It then created a detailed implementation plan for a new workflow, had that plan critiqued by three other AI agents, and refined it into a final version that included designing two new user-facing skills.
